item.title: Overflowing bins constantly left outside our windows, 27th June
item.description:
Agudas Israel Housing clearly cannot deal with the rubbish created by residents of Chai Walk. These bins are left for at least 4 days a week outside the windows of my building. It’s disgusting and they are never held accountable. Do something for once!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mount Pleasant Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
